column125:
Yes - London Cruise Terminal

Situated approximately one mile from the station, passengers may use the 99 bus which is free for rail ticket holders. Journey time is about 5 minutes, alternatively the site is 15 minutes walk away.

http://www.londoncruiseterminal.com/
